BT.modules.ClassDiagram.mainContent

Class CDBottomRightController

  • java.lang.Object
    • BT.managers.MainContentController
      • BT.modules.ClassDiagram.mainContent.CDBottomRightController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DrawingClicks
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CDMainContentController

    public abstract class CDBottomRightController
extends MainContentController
    Class for controlling right bottom Panel. This class controlls right bottom panel in class diagram. Sets buttons, and fields in right bottom panel. This class is put between main content controller and it's model because it has lot of to set.
    Author:
    Karel Hala

    • Field Detail

      • LeftBottomContent

        protected CDLeftBottomContent LeftBottomContent
        Panel which has buttons for changing join edges. It stores each button for changing style and type of join egdes.

      • LeftTopContent

        protected CDLeftTopContent LeftTopContent
        Panel which stores buttons for changing class type. If you want to create either class or interface this class has buttons for setting what you want to create.

      • useCaseConnector

        protected CDUseCaseConnector useCaseConnector
        Connector between class diagram and use case. When the class is being reconnected with use case, this connector is called.

      • useCaseReactivator

        protected CDUseCaseReactivator useCaseReactivator
        Reactivator between class diagram and use case. It stores methods for reactivating use cases and class diagrams together.

      • bottomRightContent

        protected BottomRightContentModel bottomRightContent
        Panel with buttons to reactivate or delete inactive objects. In here it is also stored adding new method or class variable.

      • attributesPanel

        protected ClassDiagramAttributesPanel attributesPanel
        Panel with text fields and buttons for inserting new attributes. In this panel is stored textfields and comboboxes for creating new class variable or new ethod.

      • leftContentModel

        protected BottomLeftContentModel leftContentModel
        Panel for saving methods and variables of class.

      • leftBottomController

        protected CDBottomLeftController leftBottomController
        controller for handeling deleting and managing of variables and methods of class.

        public CDBottomRightController(DiagramPlacesManager diagramPlaces,
                       BottomRightContentModel bottomRightContent,
                       ClassDiagramAttributesPanel attributesPanel)
        Basic constructor. Sets diagram places, bottom right content model, attributes panel. Sets drawing to class diagram drawing pane. Add buttons with listeners to pane.

        public void removeLineFromArrayListAndSetNewLine(CDJoinEdgeController joinEdge)
